entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure: 104.0 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
